thread.title: Check out AL.com's 2017 Birmingham All-Region boys basketball team
thread.title_full: Check out AL.com's 2017 Birmingham All-Region boys basketball team

author: Gary Estwick | gestwick@al.com
title: Check out AL.com's 2017 Birmingham All-Region boys basketball team
text: Birmingham enjoyed a fruitful high school boys basketball season, winning the Class 3A (Midfield) crown, as well as the Class 7A title (Mountain Brook). Meanwhile, Parker challenged for the Class 6A championship, reaching the finals, and in Class 1A, Cornerstone Christian played hard in the semifinals.
